string.name: infogate
string.br: Gateway of India is synonymous with the name, Munbai. Built for commemorating King George V visit to India in 1911, this spectacular arch in basalt also symbolised might of British triumph in India could be completed only by 1924.
Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India

string.name: infomar
string.br: Marine Drive, also called the Queenâ€™s Necklace, is one of the most easily recognizable landmarks in Mumbai. This arc-shaped bay-side boulevard lining the Arabian Sea in South Mumbai is arguably the best spot to watch beautiful sunsets and indulge in leisurely walks.
Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Road, Chowpathy, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400007,India
